text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for API calls for Cognito User Pools in the US-WEST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We can confirm increased error rates for API calls for Cognito User Pools in the US-WEST-2 Region and continue to work towards resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates>
Between 11:33 AM and 1:25 PM PDT we experienced increased error rates for API calls for Cognito User Pools in the US-WEST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
